holidays.title: National Dog Day
holidays.description: What would we do without man’s best friend?

holidays.title: National Cherry Popsicle Day
holidays.description: Cool down with the reigning nobility of the popsicle world — the cherry popsicle.

holidays.title: National Day of Repentance
holidays.description: Join us as we observe Papua New Guinea’s National Repentance Day this August 26.

holidays.title: National Kelly Day
holidays.description: Kelly was originally a boy’s name only but today, it’s more common as a girl’s name.

holidays.title: National Logan Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate the name Logan which is fun, quirky, and gender-neutral.

holidays.title: National Spark the World Day
holidays.description: To you it’s a kind word, to them it’s the spark to reach their full potential.

holidays.title: National Toilet Paper Day
holidays.description: This is an annual observance to commemorate this essential invention for personal hygiene.

holidays.title: National WebMistress Day
holidays.description: A webmistress is a woman who designs, develops, markets, and maintains websites.

holidays.title: Tracky Dack Day
holidays.description: To understand Tracky Dack Day, first, know that ‘dack’ is Australian English slang for trousers.

holidays.title: Women’s Equality Day
holidays.description: Observe the achievements of women’s rights activists and the unique daily struggles that women face.

holidays.title: Ayla Woodruff’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Instagram star is taking over the internet. Today, we celebrate her special day.

holidays.title: Dylan O'Brien’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this young and prominent actor, the future gets brighter by the minute.

holidays.title: King Cid’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's learn more about the budding YouTube star right here as we celebrate his birthday.

holidays.title: Macaulay Culkin’s Birthday
holidays.description: A kid star and millionaire at 10 years old — let’s celebrate our favorite childhood actor.

holidays.title: Mother Teresa’s Birthday
holidays.description: The nun that helped the lives of those who needed her the most. Celebrate her special day right here.
